name: skilllink-backend
description: Backend API for SkillLink skill swapping platform

scripts.migrate: node -e "const sequelize = require('./config/database'); sequelize.sync({ force: false }).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.migrate:force: node -e "const sequelize = require('./config/database'); sequelize.sync({ force: true }).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); });"
